00:00 Avatar 3: Fire and Ash
News from Pandora: During the D23 Expo, James Cameron spoke about the third part of his "Avatar" film series and revealed the first details about the title and plot.

01:59 Incredibles 3, Frozen 3, Toy Story 5
Probably the most likeable superhero family in film history is returning: after "Incredibles 2" was a huge success with worldwide box office takings of over 1.2 billion dollars, it seems that they now want to build on these impressive figures, as part 3 is officially in development.
https://kinocheck.com/news/o81fzx
